import React from "react"; import imageOverlay from "../img/earth.jpg"; import data from '../data/projects.json'; import Icon from './icon'; class Contact extends React.Component { render() { return (
Send A Message
Your message has been sent. Thank you!
Get in Touch

Whether you want to get in touch, talk about a project collaboration, or just say hi, I'm looking forward to hearing from you.

    {data.social.map((social) => { return (
    • ) })}
); } } export default Contact;
